transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Haan ji Nitin sir namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar. Boliye sir.
Customer: Sir abhi kya kya mai jaan sakta hu kya problem aa rahi hai sir final karne mein?
Executive: Sorry kya keh rahe hai aawaz bahut break ho rahi hai.
Customer: Aap khud ki koi meeting nahi ho pa rahi?
Executive: Are sir khud ke sath kon meeting karta hai? Management ke sath meeting karta hai na.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Unke sath meeting karna padta hai na.
Customer: Decision to aap hi lete ho na.
Executive: Are are sir aap bhi aap bhi executive hai aap bhi lete hai lekin aapko bhi jana padta hai na upar decision ke liye kidhar to management ko.
Customer: Haan hamare yaha to management hai hum to ek.
Customer: Hamare yaha bhi hamare yaha bhi waisi system hai sir. Management se management se baat karna padta hai na.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Meeting hota hai na. Ek ek meeting hota hai hamara weekly meeting mein baat hoga to mai bataunga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To sir kab tak kuch time aap bata sakte ho aapne jaise one is week mein bola tha isiliye maine aapko Wednesday call kiya message kiya.
Executive: Hamara hamara ek din pehle message aata hai weekly meeting hai. Kal bhi ho sakta hai parso bhi ho sakta hai Saturday bhi ho sakta hai. Jab bhi hoga mai aapko update karunga.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Theek hai sir mai wait kar raha hu aapka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Thank you very much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know the problem in finalizing.

- Unable to have a meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive said they will update after meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, finalization, update
